trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_SEQ_00<tab>His stomach behaving once more, Thancred is ready to get to work.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_TODO_00<tab>Gather information in Yedlihmad.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Khalzahl.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Matsya.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_URIANGER_000_000<tab>Be thou assured that I am quite recovered. Lassi is truly a boon for unruly stomachs.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>Is it truly so amusing to see my hair bound? 'Tis how I used to wear it. A functional fashion.

TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_ESTINIEN_000_006<tab>Perhaps you were confused by how you found me following Nidhogg's demise. It had fallen loose after the chirurgeons removed me from my armor and put me to bed. I simply decided to leave it that way for a time, seeing as I would not don the Azure Dragoon's helm again.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Right, let us split up and make inquiries in town. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the pier is yours.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_THANCRED_000_011<tab>Once we have learned what we can, we regroup by the aetheryte...off-putting though the mere sight of it may be.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The crate is laden with fruits, but they are on the verge of spoiling, as if they have been left too long.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Gazing out from the pier, you spy boats moored off nearby isles, with the silhouettes of larger seafaring vessels farther away.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Compared to other ports you have visited in the past, there appears to be very little activity.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_QEFIRAZ_000_023<tab>Well now, if it isn't a traveler... You're a rare sight in these unsettled times.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_QEFIRAZ_000_024<tab>People have been giving us a wide berth since that accursed tower suddenly appeared on Narunnair.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_QEFIRAZ_000_025<tab>If it just stood there and loomed ominously, perhaps things would be fine after a fashion, but no─it had to spawn fell fiends as well.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_QEFIRAZ_000_026<tab>We still have our lives thanks to the Radiant Host, but business is as good as dead. What'll become of us, only the gods know...
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_QEFIRAZ_000_027<tab>It's a shame not everyone's as brave as you. Or foolish.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_028<tab>What am I doing? Oh, recording my sales. Still do it daily out of habit, though I don't know why I bother. Hardly sell anything these days.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_029<tab>Business has never been this terrible...but I suppose things could be even worse. I could have a consortium to keep afloat, like Khalzahl.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_030<tab>I don't envy his position. Better to be alone with my little operation, I've come to realize.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_031<tab>You're a traveler, by the looks of you? If you have a moment, perhaps you could pay Khalzahl a visit. He'd be glad for tidings from abroad.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_032<tab>Like as not, you'll find him at the Saltwind's Sails, the harbor guild building across the water from here.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_DJINALEEL_000_033<tab>If times are tough for me, they must be a thousand times worse for Khalzahl. I can't help but worry for him.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_040<tab>And what do you expect me to do?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_050<tab>The Dalmascans aren't coming!? But we already have everything they ordered! What are we supposed to do with it?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_051<tab>I don't know, but yelling at me isn't going to help. All I know is that their plans have changed, and that's that.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_052<tab>Look, you must have known this might happen. The Empire is at war with itself, and the provinces are in chaos.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_053<tab>And then there's the tower sitting on our doorstep spitting out monstrosities.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_054<tab>The city has its defenses, but we've been afforded no protection out here. We can't blame foreigners for not wanting to take the risk.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_055<tab>Gah! But this will be an enormous loss!
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_056<tab>All right, all right... Forget about the Dalmascans. Surely <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> ships are still coming?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_057<tab>We have fresh produce, handicrafts, medicines─all the perennial Hannish favorites.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_058<tab>Our consortium works closely with merchants and artisans to supply only the finest wares. Quality is guaranteed!
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_059<tab><sigh> I know all these things, Khalzahl, I do.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_060<tab>Which is why I regret to say I have <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var> for you. All voyages have been canceled or indefinitely postponed.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_061<tab>And you are...?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_062<tab>Wait, you're a foreigner, are you not? A merchant!? Please tell me you're a merchant!
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_063<tab>I see... That's a shame...
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_064<tab>I'm sorry, but we're discussing important matters. If you need something, please talk to one of the others.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_065<tab>(-???-)Um, excuse me...
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_066<tab>M-My name is Matsya, and I'm here to see Khalzahl...
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_067<tab>Oh, it seems he's busy. I'll come back later, then...
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_KHALZAHL_000_070<tab>If foreign vessels won't come to us, why not use our own to deliver the wares to them!?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_PORTMANAGER04368_000_075<tab>It's not so simple, Khalzahl. And besides, everyone is in the same boat. <var 1A 02 /var>Everyone<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_080<tab>Y-Yes? Can I help you...?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_081<tab>Ah, I remember seeing you back in the guild. You wanted to speak with Khalzahl, too, did you?
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_082<tab>I'm Matsya, a fisherman of Akyaali─a nearby village.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_083<tab>I sell my catch to Khalzahl, who offers it to foreign merchants. But he hasn't bought anything for a while now.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_084<tab>When I heard that the consortium had been struggling, I became worried and decided to come and see him.
TEXT_AKTKMA113_04369_MATSYA_000_085<tab>...Just as soon as he's free, anyway. He's a hardworking man, and I dare not disturb him.
